name: Pickle Rick
line: Morty.

name: Morty
line: Rick?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Morty!

name: Morty
line: Rick?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Hey, Mooorty!

name: Morty
line: Rick? Are you far away, or are you inside something?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Morty, the garage, Morty. Come to the garage!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Morty?

name: Morty
line: Rick? W-where are you?

name: Pickle Rick
line: On my work bench, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Are you invisible and you're gonna, like, fart on me?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Flip the pickle over.

name: Morty
line: What, I'm gonna touch it, and you're gonna tell me it's an alien dick or something.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Come on, flip the pickle, Morty. You're not gonna regret it. The payoff is huge.

name: Morty
line: And?

name: Pickle Rick
line: "And"? What more do you want tacked on to this? I turned myself into a pickle, and 9/11 was an inside job?

name: Morty
line: Was it?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Who cares, Morty? Global acts of terrorism happen every day. Uh, here's something that's never happened before

name: Morty
line: Are you going to, I mean, you know, is this the first part of some magic trick?

name: Pickle Rick
line: I don't do magic, Morty, I do science. One takes brains, the other takes dark eye liner.

name: Morty
line: Well, can you move? Can you fly?

name: Pickle Rick
line: I wouldn't be much of a pickle if I could.

name: Morty
line: All right, well, do pickles live forever or --

name: Pickle Rick
line: Morty, stop digging for hidden layers and just be impressed. I'm a pickle.

name: Morty
line: I-I'm just trying to figure out why you would do this. Why anyone would do this.

name: Pickle Rick
line: The reason anyone would do this is, if they could, which they can't, would be because they could, which they can't.

name: Beth
line: Morty, we have to get going, or we're gonna be late. Where's your grandpa?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Right here, sweetie. I'm a pickle!

name: Beth
line: What?! Why would you -- Look, we're running late. We have to go.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Where are you guys going?

name: Beth
line: We have an appointment downtown that was set a week ago and agreed upon by everyone, including you.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, my God. Beth, oh, it totally slipped my mind. Geez, oh, man. I'm a pickle. I mean, I don't know if I can, ooh, geez.

name: Morty
line: Rick, did you do this on purpose to get out of family counseling?

name: Beth
line: Morty!

name: Pickle Rick
line: It's okay, Beth. I understand Morty's suspicion. I've misled him before. Morty, turn me so we're making eye contact.Morty, I assure you, I would never "find a way" to "get out of" family therapy. I hope my lack of fingers doesn't prevent the perception of my air quotes.

name: Summer
line: Can't you just turn yourself back into a human?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Great question, Summer. The unfortunate answer is I did this to challenge myself. And it could take hours or even days before I'm able to figure out how to return to human form. But, I mean, you know, your mom could put me in a purse or a pocket, you know, if she really needs me to go.

name: Beth
line: Nobody needs anything! Okay, it's fine. I mean, you should just stay here and figure out how to stop being a pickle, okay?

name: Morty
line: Hey, Rick, why is there a syringe of mysterious fluid hanging directly over you? Also, why is the string attached to it running through a pair of scissors attached to a timer? And why is the time set to 10 minutes from now, exactly when we would have left for therapy?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Well, Morty, if you know must know, the syringe is completely unrelated to this discussion, and, therefore, it does not warrant further explanation.

name: Beth
line: Enough. Kids, it's time to go. We don't want to be late.

name: Pickle Rick
line: W-w-what are you doing there, Beth? What are you doing there, sweetie?

name: Beth
line: Well, I mean, you don't want to get pierced by a needle full of liquid unrelated to your situation. How's that gonna help?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Can't argue with that.

name: Beth
line: Great. We'll see you later.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Hey, hey, be careful with that. It's for something else. It's really important, so don't break it. Okay, I may have fucked up here. Dup, ap, ap, pap, ut, dah, pap, pap, pap, pah. T-t-tah, tah.  Oh, great. Stupid cat.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! I know what it looks like to you, Izzy, but I'm not a snake! I've seen the YouTube videos, I know cats are scared of cucumbers and pickles because they think they're snakes. I'm not a snake! I'm a pickle, I'm a pickle!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Whoa! Oh! Whoa, whoa, whoa!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, crap, that sun is bright.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Okay, come on. This can't really be the way I go out. This is the mega-genius equivalent of dying on the toilet.

name: Pickle Rick
line: So... hot. This is how I'm gonna die.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, God, moisture.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, God, the moisture! Dial it back, God! Dial it back a little bit here!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh! Oh!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, God! Perpendicular, perpendicular!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, shiiit! Oh! Oh! Oh!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Come on. That's it.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Come get this delicious brine.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Aah! Come on! Come on, motherfucker! Come on!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Yes!

name: Summer
line: How is this even family therapy if Dad's not invited and Grandpa won't come?

name: Morty
line: Yeah, and what's courageous about eating a hot dog?

name: Beth
line: It's nobody's choice to be here, you knobs. The family was told to get counseling by your principal, even though it's not the family that was huffing pottery glaze in the art room and desk wetting in history class.

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: Oh, the Smith family, minus a dad. You're patients of Dr. Wong, too?

name: Beth
line: Temporarily. By order of the school.

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: Me too. How long have you all been eating poop?

name: Summer
line: We... have never... eaten poop.

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: Uh, me, neither. Say, where did my family get off to?

name: Dr. Wong
line: Smith family, I'm Dr. Wong. Come on in.

name: Dr. Wong
line: I was told there was a grandpa that might be joining us?

name: Beth
line: He got wrapped up in an experiment. He's a scientist. Like, legit, like on an inter-galactic, sci-fi level. His work is very --

name: Morty
line: He turned himself into a pickle.

name: Beth
line: Morty, Mom's talking. I'm sorry, I suppose that's a good segue into our little discipline cases here.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Does Grandpa turn himself into a pickle a lot?

name: Beth
line: What? No, what kind of question is that?

name: Dr. Wong
line: The kind that wasn't designed to attack or hurt you in any way.

name: Beth
line: Oh, Jesus Christ, one of these. No, my father has never turned himself into a pickle before. He's unpredictable and eccentric. The whole family is. Speaking of which...

name: Dr. Wong
line: Okay, let's open things up to the whole family, and let me ask this. Why do we think Grandpa turned himself into a pickle?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Wow. Ugh.

name: Beth
line: I didn't say my father is perfect, I said his work is important.

name: Summer
line: And she's saying what's important is that Grandpa lied to you to get out of coming here.

name: Beth
line: Oh, he did not!

name: Dr. Wong
line: Let's do an experiment here. I get the impression this family values science. So raise your hand if you feel certain you know what was in the syringe.

name: Beth
line: Do you really not see what's happening here?

name: Dr. Wong
line: Tell me.

name: Beth
line: Well, Dr. Wong -- by the way, racist name -- obviously, Morty and Summer are seizing on your arbitrary pickle obsession as an end run around what was supposed to be their therapy.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Oh, I think this pickle incident is a better path than any other to the heart of your family's dysfunction. I think it's possible that you and your father have a very specific dynamic. I don't think it's one that rewards emotion or vulnerability. I think it may punish them. I think it's possible that dynamic eroded your marriage, and is infecting your kids with a tendency to misdirect their feelings.

name: Beth
line: Fuck you.

name: Beth
line: Fuck both of you, too.

name: Pickle Rick
line: By the way, you might notice that in spite of your numerous distinctive features, I never gave you a name like Scar or Stripe or Goliath. That's because, to me, you aren't special.

name: Pickle Rick
line: God damn it, I love myself.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Pickle Riiick!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Get that parkour. Get that parkour!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Hey, it's cool. Just need to find the nearest exit.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa! No need to freak out.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Whoa! Who in the fuck's toilet is this?

name: Agency Director
line: What is it?

name: Agency Director
line: Where is it?

name: Agency Director
line: We have 34 armed guards, and we can't kill a pickle?

name: Agency Director
line: Put him on, and locate the phone he's using.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Hi, um, can you, uh  please let me out.

name: Agency Director
line: Your mere presence in this building violates international law.

name: Pickle Rick
line: You should know those men killed themselves.

name: Agency Director
line: And how is that?

name: Pickle Rick
line: They didn't  let me out.

name: Agency Director
line: Shut your mouth and do your jobs, you fucking children!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Uh, is this not a good time or...?

name: Agency Director
line: Some of my men are calling you "Solen'ya"

name: Pickle Rick
line: That'd be a lucky break for you.

name: Agency Director
line: Ah.

name: Pickle Rick
line: ...because this pickle doesn't care about your children. And I'm not gonna take their dreams. I'm gonna take their parents.

name: Agency Director
line: He's just a pickle!

name: Agency Director
line: He's not the only one.

name: Agency Director
line: Then Katarina is a prisoner. Perhaps I could arrange her escape, as well. She lives, Jaguar.

name: Dr. Wong
line: What do you think is in the syringe, Beth?

name: Beth
line: You're the one that costs $200 an hour. You tell me.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Your kids think it might be anti-pickle serum.

name: Beth
line: My kids pee their desks and suck on unbaked vases.

name: Summer
line: I never said I was angry at you.

name: Beth
line: That's the point of pottery-enamel huffing, Summer. You do it so you don't have to say "I'm angry at mommy" out loud.

name: Morty
line: Oh, my God!

name: Dr. Wong
line: It's not my job to take sides or pass judgment. Do you think when your father asks for that syringe, you could ask him --

name: Beth
line: He won't have to ask for it, okay? He won't need it. He'll just make more. He doesn't need anything from anyone.

name: Dr. Wong
line: You admire him for that.

name: Beth
line: It's better than making your problems other people's problems.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, come on!

name: Pickle Rick
line: You should know that isn't original.

name: Pickle Rick
line: There's nothing I won't do to see her again.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Yeah, there's lots I wouldn't do to see my daughter, but killing you gets me to her quicker than your derivative bullshit.

name: Pickle Rick
line: That will be your downfall, Jaguar, not being open to new experiences.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Jaguar couldn't make it.

name: Agency Director
line: Do it. Okay, you win, Pickle Man. I'm unsealing the building.

name: Pickle Rick
line: No, thanks. I'm coming for you now.

name: Agency Director
line: Pickle Man, there's $100 million worth of bonds in a safe on level two. I'll give you the combination.

name: Agency Director
line: Shut up and call me a helicopter, you prick! Do we have a deal?!

name: Pickle Rick
line: Take that money, give it to Jaguar's daughter when you set her free. Or I'll be visiting you.

name: Agency Director
line: Jaguar's daughter is dead.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Huh, so you're a liar.

name: Agency Director
line: Jaguar was an animal. You're an intelligent pickle. We can do business.

name: Pickle Rick
line: I don't think so. See you soon.

name: Agency Director
line: Is the helicopter here?

name: Agency Director
line: Tell them we were robbed.

name: Agency Director
line: Farewell, Solen'ya.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Well, my daughter is about five away, and I've got about eight to live.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, well, uh, she knows. I mean, we don't really buy into that kind of crap, to the extent that love is an expression of familiarity over time, my access to infinite timelines precludes the necessity of attachment. In fact, I even abandoned one of my infinite daughters in an alternate version of earth that was taken over by mutants.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Huh? Uh, no. No, nope, sorry about that. Nope, just me. Yeesh!

name: Beth
line: I am afraid that my kids will get expelled.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Good. Summer, you go.

name: Summer
line: I am mad that I can't huff enamel without people assuming it's because my family sucks. I hope to be seen one day as someone that just likes getting high.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Good job. Morty, do you have an "I" statement?

name: Morty
line: I am sad that I peed. I'm sad that I peed in class instead of a toilet.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Look at this family go. You guys are pros. What do you guys think about doing this once a week?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Ugh.

name: Dr. Wong
line: You must be Rick.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Dr. Wong
line: I've heard a lot about you today. Your family is crazy about you. Your daughter holds you in very high regard. You're a lucky fella.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Yeah, thank you. Uh, sweetie, you don't still happen to have that syringe in your purse?

name: Beth
line: Dad I would like you to tell me what's in the syringe.

name: Pickle Rick
line: It's a serum that I need to, uh, to stay alive. I have had a rough day. And, uh, I've sustained a lot of damage. I'm pretty close to death, which the serum will prevent.

name: Dr. Wong
line: By changing you from a pickle to a human.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Yes.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Rick, why did you lie to your daughter?

name: Pickle Rick
line: So I wouldn't have to come here.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Why didn't you want to come here?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Because I don't respect therapy, because I'm a scientist. Because I invent, transform, create, and destroy for a living, and when I don't like something about the world, I change it. And I don't think going to a rented office in a strip mall to listen to some agent of averageness explain which words mean which feelings has ever helped anyone do anything.  I think it's helped a lot of people get comfortable and stop panicking, which is a state of mind we value in the animals we eat, but not something I want for myself. I'm not a cow. I'm a pickle. When I feel like it. So...you asked.

name: Dr. Wong
line: Rick, the only connection between your unquestionable intelligence and the sickness destroying your family is that everyone in your family, you included, use intelligence to justify sickness.  You seem to alternate between viewing your own mind as an unstoppable force and as an inescapable curse. And I think it's because the only truly unapproachable concept for you is that it's your mind within your control. You chose to come here, you chose to talk -to belittle my vocation- just as you chose to become a pickle.  You are the master of your universe, and yet you are dripping with rat blood and feces. Your enormous mind literally vegetating by your own hand.  I have no doubt that you would be bored senseless by therapy, the same way I'm bored when I brush my teeth and wipe my ass. Because the thing about repairing, maintaining, and cleaning is it's not an adventure. There's no way to do it so wrong you might die. It's just work. And the bottom line is, some people are okay going to work, and some pee well, some people would rather die. Each of us gets to choose.

name: Pickle Rick
line: I, um I'm sorry I lied to get out of the thing. I, I shouldn't lie to you.

name: Beth
line: Oh, it's fine. I mean, thank you, and, yeah, you shouldn't. But I hope you know that's not what that session was supposed to be.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Oh, no, I mean, I know it was Morty peeing his pants and Summer snorting glue or whatever...

name: Beth
line: She huffed enamel, and we never even talked about it.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Well, there was so much more at stake. I mean, that shrink, what a monologuist.

name: Summer
line: Are we gonna go back?

name: Pickle Rick
line: Sweetie, could I get Get that syringe now?

name: Beth
line: Oh, my God, yes! Dad, it's in my purse. Oh, I'm sorry. You must be in agony.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Eh.

name: Pickle Rick
line: Jesus. Jesus Christ. Therapists, man.

name: Beth
line: Weird breed.

name: Rick
line: Man, I missed having hands and blood and a stomach.

name: Beth
line: Really? Like, go somewhere? Yeah, let's drop the kids off and go tie one on.

name: Rick
line: Absolutely.

name: Morty
line: I, I liked her.

name: Beth
line: So what are you thinking, like, Smokey's Tavern? Maybe Shoney's?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, either one. Either one.

name: Rick
line: You'll never get away with this, Concerto.

name: Rick
line: This is it, Morty. We're goners. We're not getting out of this one. After everything we've been through, this is how we're gonna die. Make peace with your god.

name: Morty
line: Oh, geez, Rick, I-I-I don't want to die!

name: Rick
line: Jaguar!

name: Morty
line: Who? Who was that, Rick?

name: Rick
line: That, Morty, is why you don't go to therapy.
